ItemTooltips.gem: You're not a great Gem carrier since swapping will frequently result in your death, but that doesn't stop you from buying it and giving it to someone a little tankier.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Since you'll be roaming all the time, you may as well ward the runes while you're at it.
ItemTooltips.courier: You should be picking up both the courier and the wards, you'll be getting plenty of assist gold later on.
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: TP -> gank -> TP -> gank. Never be seen without one. About to use one? Buy another.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: As the game goes on, you'll find yourself transitioning into a full support - this is a great item for its armor bonus alone though.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Amazing for the ability to swap creeps and escape from anywhere
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Combined with Tranquils, you'll never go back to the fountain again
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: Great for keeping your HP up between ganks

AbilityTooltips.vengefulspirit_magic_missile: Max early for its damage and stun duration - your ideal ganking tool
AbilityTooltips.vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror: Whilst the armor reduction is its main purpose, don't forget its (tiny) damage and also the incredible vision it gives - perfect for checking the Roshan pit.
AbilityTooltips.vengefulspirit_command_aura: An aura that is incredible in the late game but next to useless early on, save it for last.
AbilityTooltips.vengefulspirit_nether_swap: Swap and stun for the ideal initiation.
